Text: tensks but it little dipicaat to unzip

Its piss easy to install...  and requires no version of a crack.

-Created folder on desktop
-Unzip all contents of 4th folder into folerder on desktop.
-Unzip only the rxx files from the remaining three folders into the folder created on the desktop.
-7zip the rxr file, and extract it to folder on the desktop.
-run the installer
-enjoy the program

Took me 2 minutes to have it installed.  Thanks uploader.
